title: High Exposure to PM2.5 Pollution
description: In 2017, 100% of Kenya's population was exposed to PM2.5 pollution levels exceeding both the WHO Interim Target-3 and guideline values, indicating significant air quality challenges.

title: Strong Macroeconomic Management
description: Kenya achieved a CPIA macroeconomic management rating of 4.5 in 2023, reflecting a robust economic policy framework.

title: Minimal Arms Imports
description: In 2022, Kenya's arms imports were valued at 1,000,000 SIPRI trend indicator values, indicating a low reliance on foreign military equipment.

title: Full Female Progression to Secondary School
description: By 2015, Kenya achieved a 100% progression rate for females advancing to secondary school, showcasing a commitment to female education.
